description.sun-moon:
The user heals the target’s status condition. If the
move succeeds, it also restores the user’s own HP.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user heals the target’s status condition. If the
move succeeds, it also restores the user’s own HP.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user heals the target’s status condition. If the
move succeeds, it also restores the user’s own HP.
description.sword-shield:
The user heals the target’s status condition. If the
move succeeds, it also restores the user’s own HP.

effect.full: Cures the target of its major status ailment and heals the user for 50% of its max HP.  If the target has no major status ailment, this move will fail.
effect.shortEffect: Cures the target of a major status ailment and heals the user for 50% of its max HP.
